name: hotel-website
description: A static website for a hotel showcasing its features and services.

scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:assets
scripts.build:css: mkdir -p dist/css && cleancss -o dist/css/style.min.css src/css/style.css && cleancss -o dist/css/animations.min.css src/css/animations.css && cleancss -o dist/css/carousel.min.css src/css/carousel.css
scripts.build:js: mkdir -p dist/js && terser src/js/script.js -o dist/js/script.min.js -c -m && terser src/js/carousel.js -o dist/js/carousel.min.js -c -m
scripts.preview: npm run build && npm run serve:dist
